content.detailedDescription: We where at a house at january first around noon just celebrating the new years day then we saw three black objects in a equilateral triangle formation hovering about 600 ft over the ground then we new for sure that this was not a human veicle and it must have been a ufo from how perfect the three objects were in a exact triangle. the ufo had three objects each in one corner of a triangle formation and for about 20 seconds it was hovering over the ground then it just flashed away in a matter of seconds. we were so shocked a curious we were going to call the police but we decided not to and just contact this website. we lost sight just by seeing it flying away in a north path in a matter of seconds
content.summary: We saw three hovering objects over the road in a triangle shape

content.detailedDescription:
My husband was taking our dog out aroung 8 pm. he can back into the house and asked me to come outside. way above us in the sky where 4 beams of tight(looked  cylinder with round lights around). they where making a pattern each moving away from each other then meetin all back together(i felt they where looking for something or gathering info). i quickly ran inside and got my cellphone.  i started taken pictures and even a video on my phone. the objects seem to move in directions that i never saw before almost like gravity didn't effect them.  we where startled and i scared we went inside as i looked at the pictures on my phone i noticed nothing came out not even the video.  i quickly went outside again. it looked like they where going away from us. i still took some pictures.  i did manage to get one picture on my phone 
we went inside and didn't know what we saw  i feel shaken by the experience, i feel what ever we saw was very advance technolgy.  nothing was on the news about it the next day. i did tell some family members and friends. but they are skeptical and feel it was our military doing maneuvers or a droid.  i really don't know what we saw.
content.summary: 4 bright lights in the night sky each moving in different directions then coming together

content.detailedDescription: Me and my brother were heading home from ruch oregon to prospect oregon. we were taking a backway around the rim of the northern part of the rogue valley when i notcied a light in the sky heading in our direction. it was a typical flight path for approaching planes heading into medford international airport. so i noticed it, but payed no more attention to it as we passed into a hilly treed section of highway.About 5 minutes later we came into another open section of rad and i noticed the light was closer but still in the sky. in that time a typical passenger airplane would have been to the airport already within 5 minutes. i mentioned it to my brother who acknowledged also seeing it 5 mintues before. first, i thought it was abeacon strung by a large cable in the sky as a warning to low flying planes...Then i noticed the mountains were to far about to run cables like that. se we thought it must be a helicopter.It had red and blue lights on the left and right side that blinked and also a steady white light that stayed lit. looked like a maned aircraft!! and then we again disappeared around a corner and into another covered and treed section of road.(we turned off the highway right before that and was on a backway into shady cove oregon. we drove 5 more minutes and rounded a corner and as we went aroung and up the hill, we drove into another open section of road and encountered that blinking object hovering above a powerline next a transistor(i think). as we went aroung the corner we went onto a straight stretch of road very quickly and passed under the object. my brother slammed on his breaks to the jeep(convertible) and we slowed to a halt and barely crossed under the object before we stopped maybe a cars length past the objext as it continued to hover. at first i thought it was a helicopter, then i realised it was dead silent outside other than our vehicle. so i laughed and exclaimed out loua what the hell is it?".....My brother quickly exclaimed, " it's a herrier!"...( a british hovering jet ).....The i responded , "where is the wind?!!"...Weboth began top laugh out loud...The craft was only 5-10 feet off the road and 20 feet in the air.....The encounter lasted about 20-30 seconds(just long enough to speak those few sentences to each other) before the object began to rise into the air.It still had the white light with the red and blue blinking...But i couldnt see the actual craft! it was a starlit night and they were out in force! as we passed underneath the object blotted out the star light in the shape of what looked to be a small triangle no larger than our jeep. it was the size of a automobile. it didnt go striaght up..It beghan to slowly rise but mainly wemt away from us to the west north west. as it picked up speed all i could hear was the sound of the object pushing thru the air. like a swoosh against the wind.It started away slowly but within seconds it was traveling at speeds much greater than any aircraft ive seen. and ive seen fighter jets fly!! it was seconds before it hugged the northern rim of the valley and then turned north at incredible speeds and then picked up even more sppen and shot out of sight.It only took abot 5-10 seconds for the object to be totally gone from sight. frpm the slow retreat to the all out radical sppeds,it was less then 10 seconds total time from first retreat until it was totally gone.....Now,ive taken some science courses and i could be convinced of a silent running military craft. klamth air base is close to their for any aircraft. but there is no way to not disturb the air around a hovering object. without newtons 2nd law of equal and opposite actions, we couldnt fly on earth! you have to move mass! wether thats exploding jet fiel or propeller pushing air or whatever other method one might employee, to float you must cause mass x speed of the propellent to exactly equal the mass x speed of the object....Any inequality will result in going up or down in the air. but there are no methods known to man that can cause a craft to hover without disturbing the air around the craft. and as we were almost directly underneath the wind should have been considerable. so they must have employed a method of flight that is as of yet, based on principles that are not commonly (or uncommonly) known...And when it left it evenmtually deperted with great speed that the craft accessed very rapidly. a very fast acceleration! evenm though at first it left us very slowly. i looked at the object with a eye that wasn not completely ignorant. i know it did not fly based on traditional systems we know of. and in hindsight, i realised that i could not see the object very well, nor could i see the field or anything else. i think it shined a light on us! it blocked most of my vision of anyhting else but the immediate area underneath the object. everything was dark! but i should have been able to see it! the white light kept us from seeing very well,and since the rest of the area was still dark i think the light shined directly on us and did not emminate into other immediate areas. i couldnt see 10 feet past the object! everything was dark still and my vision decreased from the light...Yet everything remained dark. im posotive it shined a light, but i didnt pay attention as i was focused on the craft and the situation at hand. we told our parents as soon as wee got home, and that night it was reported by others along with video to the local news!! people up and down interstate 5(north of medford to portland) reported seeing a ufo that night according to local news. we never repoerted seeing it, but we were ;ess than 20 feet from the object everyone seen that night! further, i found it very odd it was so close to the powerline and that transisitor. it was 5 feet from it! right by the transistor!! im not sure, and i doubt it...But maybe the electric company has infirmation abouit unexplained power losses that day. it must have been powering up. there cant be any other reason for it. though it was super odd it chose a location so close to a road were people frequently drive!! always wondered why it didnt find a more remote location. so we seen it 3 times total!! the last time being about 20 feet underneath it and five feet off the road. whats strange too, is i also seen something like this as a young kid. in the woods. except it was different. it was a slow moving fireball! looked like a small red sun!! it even had a tail whipping around like a comet. it was right over the trees and made the trees sway violently! the toips of the trees started shaking like here was a strong wind blowing thru,i seen the bats fly from the tree tops.....Then i seen the red glowing fireball slowly pass overhead. that incident was not very far from where me and my brother seen that floating craft. i never tell people about this stuff, but i guess maybe i shouldnt care...Anyway, thats what i seen.
content.summary: Seen car sized ufo above poerwline next to the road.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving east on a service road,along side of hwy 94,one mile west of co. road 15.A very bright reflection hit my eye and when i looked i saw nothing.While i was still looking at the area the reflection happened again,this time i was able to see the object for a second.Again while i was looking at the same area the objects reflection happened the third time and this time i saw the object clearly. it was a large disc shape craft,dull gray in color with a silver dome in the middle that was the cause of the reflection. the reflection was very intense causing me to squint briefly. the reflection happened when the object was making a turn causing it to bank. when the object leveled out it disappeared. there was not a cloud in the sky and the object blended into the color of the sky becoming invisible. i have watched your show for awhile now and lately the point of objects disappearing at the blink of an eye has come up more and more prompting me to file this report.I have never believed in ufos until i started doing bible study and finding out ufos are mentioned in gods words.Thank you,keep up the good work and god bless.
content.summary: Bright reflection hit my eyes,then disappeared,happened 3 times

content.detailedDescription: Noticed the object move toward us from the north. it was a glowing orange/red. the object was on a path to cross overhead but slowed and stopped. i waited to hear the object but it did not ever make a sound and disappeared. this object was not in a flight path normally taken by local air medical ambulance nor was it a plane or firework.
content.summary: Object came toward me from the north, slowed and stopped, then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: Son was  outside with friend and noticed a bright, hovering object in sky.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 3-5 objects hovering, then change of direction. changing colors

content.detailedDescription:
I stepped outside to have a smoke on my back deck and i noticed 3 lights that were diagnol flashing like crazy. after realizing that it was't a plane i called my daughter outside to see. neither of us could figure out exactly what it was so we got my camera and i began recording. the object began to move around and change shape. it wound up going lower towards the ground changing to a triangle shape. i had stopped recording by that point and was taking photos. so i do have video footage of it on youtube as well as some photos that i will include in the report. i didn't focus my camera the greatest because i was not sure how long we would be seeing the lights. luckily i had it in a half decent focus so you can get the general idea. i did notice going through the photos that it seemed to be rotating. i am not sure but that is just what it looks like when i go through them in order.By the time i took the last photo the object/objects were already really low and barely visible. i did not see in the photo but it would of been in same area just slightly above the roof of the house. another thing i noticed in the pictures was the green glare on them. i do not know what causes it but i do know that when i take photos of the moon and such sometimes i will see a green circle and such. i think it is a type of glare. but the last photo you could not really see the objects but you can see the green glare perfectly. it was just odd and odd how the objects were in position compared to the glare. usually i would see it in front of the object and not on the side like that. 
eventually we wound up losing site of it. it went below the tree's so i am unsure of what happened to it. 
[link moved to fi section/cms/tg]
content.summary: 3 random lights flashing crazy kind of like a runway

content.detailedDescription: While driving on rt 195 w (near jackson) i witnessed a grey object bouncing west of my car. as i drove west bound this object shot across the road way and turned into my car. as it got closer i witnessed this object spinning 12-6 no 9 to 3...It grazed my driver side of my car(no damage) and into the car driving in the right lane next to me. that car may of been hit. the car next to me stopped on the roadway..
content.summary: Grey spinning object

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on patterson rd. approaching hwy 29 in the car with my 3 children who are ages 15, 13 and 11. we saw large orange-reddish lights least 8-10 in quantity that extended out to cover a length as long as a football field. they appeared to have a shape that resembled a triangle and they were not moving from the spot above the intersection of plantation and hwy 29. we seemed to drive up under the object which was above the tree line but not in the clouds since the sky was very clear at the time. at chevron, 1850 lawrenceville highway, lawrenceville, ga 30044 we turned right on hwy 29 towards sugarloaf parkway and remained "under" the object until we reach the autozone which is at advance auto parts, 1614 lawrenceville highway, lawrenceville, ga 30044-4606 which is .5miles in distance. we stopped at red light and exchanged a conversation with witnesses in other vehicles who had observed the same thing and we asked each other what we thought it was. the traffic heading down hwy 29 in the opposite direction from our car normally travels at speeds of 55-60mph but it was noticeable slower as if they were slowing to observe the effect they were approaching. the time was about 9:35pm since were we heading to church for new year's eve observance and skies were clear.
content.summary: Saw orange/red lights approaching corner of plantation and hwy29 zip 30044

content.detailedDescription:
I left my house to go to work one morning, and i looked up to see what kind of day it was. it was very cloudy. then in one spot the clouds parted showing a blue sky, and i thought to myself; "well maybe it will clear up". 
just then i saw two objects in that clear space hovering one above the other. i thought "what are those things" then i saw a flash from the one above going to the one below, they seemed very close together, then it seemed the lower disc retaliated. then the opening in the clouds closed, and i saw no more.
content.summary: 2 disc haped objects hovering one above the other seemed to be shooting at each other

content.detailedDescription: Woke up again around 4am.  looked out window.  saw the same bright star like object that i have seen 2 other times at the same hour.  same position also.  made a slow descent to the tree tops.  quite a ways away.  the only difference with this one as opposed to the other sightings is that this one became much dimmer as it approached the tree tops thus disappearing from site.  this seems to be a pattern and these things may possibly be in the same place in the sky even on the nights that i do not wake up,
content.summary: Bright white and star like

content.detailedDescription: I was outside watching fireworks when i noticed a red fireball like object flying in a linear flight path towards the east. i knew it wasn't fireworks because of the amount of time the object was in flight. i was surprised to see a red orb twice in less than twelve hours.
content.summary: 2nd red fireball in less than 12 hours

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Driving through residential area called meadow pointe subdivision around 8:35 pm when i saw an orange/red glowing object overhead towards the east. made me ask "what the heck is that?". appeared to be circular but without defined edges and was very close, maybe 500 - 600 feet away. it appeared to be about the size of a golf ball to my eyes, but given its height must have been larger than this if seen up close. was convinced this was something unusual, so i turned my car around and went back to see it again and same object was a little further away and higher up. took my eyes off of it because i was driving, and when i looked back up towards where last seen i saw a chevron shaped set of 6 white lights, and, i think, a red light, too. this object appeared high in the sky and was about an inch or so long in my visual field. this appeared to be higher than when i had last seen the orange globe but in the same direction of it.  the lights were there, really high up, and then were gone, like they disappeared. didn't see them move off rapidly, fade away or anything.  they just disappeared. night was cloudless but there was high humidity. moon had large ring around it but otherwise the sky was clear.  seeing the object left me wondering what the heck it was.  i really can't explain it.  i was excited to be something so unusual and perplexed about what it was.
content.summary: Orange glowing orb that turned into chevron shaped 6 white lights then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: Close to midnight jan. 1st 2015, parked car looked at the night sky and saw this orange light in the sky coming in my direction. new it wasn't a plane, had no flashing red lights, no white or yellow lights. silently flew directly overhead and just kept going till it was out of sight.
content.summary: Orange orb flying in a straight line from nw to se directly overhead coming from the direction of o'hare.

content.detailedDescription: Myself,  my wife and my daughter were traveling by cruise ship from freeport bahamas to ft lauderdale fl in july 1998. about half way through the trip there was a cylindrical object shot across the sky from the south towards the north.  at first i thought it may be something like the shuttles rocket boosters,  but they wouldn't be shooting across the sky by themselves.  as it crossed over the ship heading north there was what looked like a 50 foot trail of fire coming out the back of it.  there was a very long smoke trail left by this object.  the shuttle had taken off from canaveral a few days before this, but i don't think it could of been any piece of it because this thing was shooting across the water at about 50 feet off the surface and it never slowed down as it continued north along the atlantic ocean inside the devils triangle. after i finally lost view of the object as it got out of sight i felt strange til i got off the ship.
content.summary: On cruise ship from freeport bahamas to ft lauderdale fl. cylinder flew over with flames shooting out

content.detailedDescription: 1.Outside on 9-11-2001 2. movement of starlike pattern object in perfect formation maybe heading to military bases but no sound -triangle over 50 lights but in between sky blacked out was headed east to west  3-4. with planes grounded it was a feeling that it had to be a large stealth plane that were so high that you could not hear sound  5.A little bit of fear that they might not be american  6. object went from horizon to horizon
content.summary: Silent 50+ lights in perfect triangle-blocked light in between starlike lights

content.detailedDescription: On my way home from getting a coffee at mcdonalds because i couldn't fall back sleep. i initially thought it was a star, i live in a pretty rural area, and the light it was giving off was impossible not to notice. it seemed to be in one spot then i noticed it move a little to my right so i kept staring and driving and it kept getting closer. i tried to take a pic but it was impossible while driving and i didn't want to lose it. once i realized i had passed my house i started to get nervous as it's size was becoming more apparent that it was closer. i felt in a trance. i was excited and scared and finally something in me snapped and i turned around and went home. i couldn't see if it had moved or not.
content.summary: Driving down my road, thought it was a low or huge star... kept driving, and it kept getting bigger then i realized it was moving. it completely had me in a trance and i realized i had passed my house a mile ago.

content.detailedDescription: I think they where in my house again and i really need to talk to some one
content.summary: Unknown

content.detailedDescription: Seen the light in the sky and realized it wasn't any plane or copter i'd ever seen before. it was glowing reddish copperish colors it was like a fire ball. it hoverd for an bit then i don't know if its me being wierd but i felt like they knew i had seen them and then it started its ascent. it ascended extremely fast! faster than any jet or chopper i'd seen! it ascended at a 90Â° angle in the north east direction. i don't know what a saw but it wasn't anything i've observerd in the sky before. the speed and the heighth that thing traveled was mind blowing. in 2 sec it ascended and it was gone as if it traveled out into space! man freaking crazy!
content.summary: Red copperish colored firey object in the sky hovered for a bit then ascended up extremely quick then dissapeared

content.detailedDescription: I was on my out from my camp road, driving down a rural street to the main road intersection.  just 100' from turning onto the main road, i noticed what appeared to be a very bright star in the sky to the nw.  it was around 4pm in the summertime and so a star that bright and that large should not have been visible at this time of day.  it was stationary in the sky and i could see exhaust trails behind it from 2 commercial jets crossing paths far behind this object.  i took out my binoculars for a closer look and what i saw amazed me.  the object was very shiny and i believe it was reflecting the sun.  from my view, it appeared to be about 5/8" long and was shaped like an elongated football on end.  it never moved, or changed in anyway all the time i observed it.  i watched it for about 10 minutes until some clouds finally obscured it from my sight.  i then left the area.
content.summary: Observed a shiny, mettalic like object hovering in the sky

content.detailedDescription: Was orange moved slow to the left saw a red blinking light over it from plane....Stayed still pulsated then went up slowly and dimed out...Three of us watched this outside the back of our house
content.summary: Hovered about eight mins

content.detailedDescription:
Observed an initial red object hovering. several others appeared after, movement appeared organized and not purely environmental.

this was reported in local news here - was only other report i could find which actually covered. the video the reporter describes as being from southern california almost exactly matches the observations described in this report. [link moved to fi section/cms/tg]
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Red orange objects observed moving in synchronous fashion.

content.detailedDescription: As i was driving down the road, i observed approximately 5 amber colored lights, east of my location.  the lights were evenly spaced and traveling at a steady rate west bound.  i stopped my vehicle and got out to try to take video and pictures.  i noticed that there was no sound coming from the objects.  i couldn't tell how high they were or any type of shape or form, just lights.  i noticed a light or two fade out then reappear but am unsure if that was the objects going behind cover of some sort, like clouds or trees etc. the objects continued west until i couldn't see them behind the trees.  i was thrilled to see an unidentifiable object.  i contacted the local police dispatch and they had not received any reports of what i had seen.
content.summary: Straight evenly spaced amber lights traveling at a steady rate west bound

content.detailedDescription: 12/31/14 at 10:45 pm was checking on livestock in a field 1/4 mile away from house.  neighbors were shooting lots of fireworks.  when arrived at field to unlock gate saw orange light in sky travelling north to south under light cloud cover.  as it came overhead i noticed it made no sound nor did it have other flashing lights as a plane would.  the object moved slowly about the speed of a small plane and made an arching turn to the west and disappeared over the western horizon.  it was then i noticed another identical light then a line of 3 more and then another single and then two more close together then another single all following the same path and making the same turn disappearing over the western horizon 9 all total.  i noticed that as they passed all my neighbors stopped shooting their fireworks which probably meant they were looking at the lights too.  the sky and thin layer of spotty clouds were backlit by the almost full moon and i took a close look at one of the lights with a 9 power rifle scope i had in the truck and there was no shape of a craft, just a bright orange light.  our local air force base was shut down for the holidays with no planes flying and the tower was not manned.  i checked with the local sherriff and they had no call ins about the lights.  another interesting point is i have a small dog that was with me and he has never shown an interest in airplanes before yet he sat and watched the lights as they went by.  during the encounter i called my wife who was at home 1/4 of a mile away and she went outside only to see the last 2 as they passed over.  i am absolutely sure these were not planes or helicopters but i could not say what they were.  i will watch the sky more closely from now on!
content.summary: Line of 9 orange lights single file across sky from n to s then curved to w and dissappeared over horison

content.detailedDescription:
august 4th, 2005
                           6:30 - 7:00 pm
      
       it was a thursday, my ex husband "s" birthday so after work we had driven to fayetteville from fort smith arkansas in order to celebrate with our daughter and her family. we were going to go shoot a few games of pool, not much as we had 16.00 on us this day before payday.              we pulled off the interstate at fayetteville and stopped at local convenience store. as we got out i noticed the setting sun and 2 bright lights flying low inside the suns bright rays. one was bigger than the other. i pointed them out to "s" and i noticed several patrons had also noticed them. we all looked in mild awe and then we went on about our buisness.I had forgotten about these lights until the day after the sighting. i dont know that they are related to the event or not, is just one of several oddities to take place before the actual sighting. from there we went to our friend "d"s house to say hi. oddly enough, while there we had a discussion about ufos. i had no opinion as ive only seen weird lights on occasion. the talk is the 2nd oddity before the sighting. at 8:15 we left for "m"s house on old missouri rd.  
         "m" and "c" had decided not to go after all so i borrowed a shirt from "m", told them we would be only a few hours as we were low on funds and we left. we went to a pub in town and we each had 2 draft beers between 8:30 and 10:30. we ran into friends so we stayed until 12:00 am. we made it to "m"s at 12:30 or so. the house was dark so we were very quiet. i stretched out on the couch and "s" went out to the front porch to have a smoke before turning in. he was gone for 3 minutes or so when he quietly came back in and asked me to come outside with him, he wanted to show me something. it was a dark starry night. the porch light was off so it was very dark. he pointed up above a tree across the road and ask me "what is that"? hovering just above the tree tops was a brilliant,chrystal or teardrop shaped thing. it was beautiful. like a blue, spinning chrystal. it reflected light as well as had blue flashing lights all over it and it appeared to maybe be spinning. it was big. then he pointed to the south just a block away was another one only smaller. it was 100 feet in the air above our local social security office located a few blocks south on joyce st. then he pointed way up in the sky from north to west to south was 5 transparent things shaped like a childs drawing of a house with the square topped by a triangle. each one was a different color. i remember green, red, yellow, blue and red. they were evenly spaced across the heavens. i thought of sentrys when i saw them. so in a circle of all around above was something. we were the first witnesses. i tried to have a cool head so i decided that since we had had a small amount of alcohol that we needed more witnesses so i ran to "m"s room and woke her and "c" up.... thru their grumbleing i managed to get them outside. i pointed it all out to them and their mouths fell open. now i noticed 2 neighbors from the house next door due north from "m"s place had come outside and were awestruck. "m" and "c" said they didnt know what they were but they were going back into their house and going back to bed because they didnt want any part of whatever this was.Next i called my mom, its about 1:15 am by this time.I was surprised that she actually answered the phone. i breathlessly told her what was up. she beleived me, ask me what they looked like? then she said to pay attention and she would call me early in the morning when she woke up. she told me to be careful.She then suggested calling the police maybe? hmmmmmm.... i then gave "d" a call. he was freaking out because of our talk that very evening about a topic that we had never mentioned to each other in the 15 years that we had been friends. i told him that they were sooo bright that maybe , from 3 miles awy, if he looked to the eastern night sky he might see blue light or to look way up to try and find the colored sentries. i began to notice a gold star that was way up between the two blue things. i thought it might be mars and i marveled at how much light it was still manageing to project in light of the brightness of these things. they were dazzleing. you just couldnt help but to look at them, in awe, as many questions about life elsewhere was being answered in our hearts and minds. i noticed a neighbor man on the south side had come out in his pajamas i think. awe and wonder had all of us talking in hushed tones, no one had their porch light on, offering at least the illusion of antonimity while gazeing from the shadows. 
        we didnt speak to any of the others, we all just stared bravely at a miracle. of course it had occurred to me that they were parked just above a private mountain and pasture for cows. they like steak just like we do i think. so i hoped they were just haveing dinner. nothing that beautiful could have bad in tentions. but what were their ultimate intentions for the whole of the neighborhood. at 1:30 or 2:00 am i turned off the gps on my cell phone and then i placed an anonymouse call to the fayetteville police department. the female dispatcher sounded like an older lady. i told her what we were looking at and maybe an officer should come by soon and see for himself. she immediately said "ma am? what is your location?" i told her that my location wasnt important here, that if an officer went to the social security office on joyce street and looked up that he would see what is up with no help from anyone. i hung up on her and thats when the first chill went up my spine. what were they really hanging out for so long? their continued presence began to be unnerveing as abduction finally creeped along my thoughts, i had seen a tv show about abduction. i thought about that they say that you dont remember anything after they are done with you soooo... thats a bonus i guess. they bright star suddenly began to grow bigger as it descended from its hideing in plane site position to slowly descend directly down to shine its light on us. it literally shined like a big flash light. i again was amazed and frozen. my instincts kicked in and i wanted the sheltered anonimoty of the dark porch but it was too late. they gold ball seemed to possibly have blinked and it stopped and looked at me... it noticed me and i realized that the night was slipping away, that their agenda was to be carried out in the cover of darkness. there was only a few hours of dark left so if we refused to go to sleep so they could violate us and erase our memories. easy peasy that way. but perhaps they were getting impatient and i had heard that they could grab you up in a beam of light, that the beam of light hurt and that you might remember that! so i backed awy and ddashed into the house to fall asleep quick, i would cooperate. i looked in on my grand daughter asleep in her room and she was fine. the house was totally dark except for the back porch lightshineing into the liveing room thru the glass door, i noticed that the dogs were very quiet out back there. i heard a buzzing and i watched from the couch as the porch light flashed on and off going dim and then bright. i forced my eyes shut. my husband took a place on the floor about10 feet across the room and in front f the fire place.He was positioned with his head faceing west and his feet the east.I was scared.
          one more thing that i need to explain is the very fast, black, flat air craft or ufo that circled the sky right under neath of these things and i had began to notice planes come in from the east flying west. one about every 5 minutes for hours. the flat black thing had a very large, bright red flashing light on top of it. i felt it was issueing a warning of some kind...It paid particular attention to the sentries whom actually climbed in altitude to appear smaller and way, way up there, in the blink of an eye.So i had the impression that our military out in fort chaffee arkansas just 45 miles away had been alerted. but none of the planes paid any attention to the crafts, only the black thing buzzing around with a red light paid any attention.
            so i fell asleep immediately after i watched the buzzing and flashing on and off, dim to bright. i wasnt afraid, i was even curiouse. i awoke from the sensation of being dropped, dropped from a ways up and i landed in a deep crouch right in the middle of "s"s chest where i straddled him and pummeled him awake screaming ""s"! wake up!!! we have to kill them! we have to kill them". i remeber feeling releived when i noticed that the sun was comeing up, the night was finally over. "s" was in a completely different position and place on the flooor than when we had passed out. he was 5 feet closer to me than before. no, im not a drama queen. i promise that this is true to the best of my knowledge. the next evening the neighbors all had their chairs outside watching the lights approach from the west just as the night before. i scanned the sky for anymore objects and found nothing. we got in our car and high tailed it back to fort smith arkansas and tried to put it behind us. we aerent harrassed by men in black but we began to get pulled over alot after that.
          we moved into our new apartment in springdale in october 2005. hurricane katrina had just devestated new orleans and another catagory 5 storm called rita was bearing down on my home town freeport texas and galveston texas. katrina hit exactly 14 days or 2 weeks exactly after the event. i have watched many shows about ufos to try and find anyone else with a similar experience with the blue sparkly thing. this is also how i knew that this was big, in comparison to many other sightings mine is phenominal. most sightings are fleeting. the fact that there was so many different types of craft lends to importance i would think. the first week in my new apartment a small blue light parked itself in the southern sky right outside my door. i have sence had 3 other terrorifying ,weird and frightening experiences in the middle of the night. in one experience i wake up , i sit up and look across my bed, across roberts sleeping form at 3little hispanic men. very short. the one in the middle had like a flashlight effect under his chin and his eyes were animal eyes. again i screamed and pummeled roberts unwakeing body, i pummeled his chest in my terror. they were only 3 feet tall.That happened here in my apartment. another time i came too in my liveing room, i was in only panties and i was stumbleing around because my body wouldnt work. my arms and legs were flying around all crazy all on their own and i was paniced and i developed nausea after i got my body tucked into my bed. to this day im terrorfied when i wake up at 3 am or so and i wonder if there is creepy things in the bathroom because i sure need to pee. 
           our family had been targeted along with people across the road by huge, bright lights and creepers around the house. when i was growing up we would watch lights out over the texas prairie grow larger, then smaller. they moved around sometimes too. once me and my brother were listening to the radio in moms car in the evcening time, it was dark and starry.  we watched an large triangle shaped craft fly slowly over our house. it was black and it had lights on it. looking back i beleive that we may have seen the then mythical  war creature called th stealth bomber. houston is right up my road after all. nasa and all that stuff. my boyfriend has been keeping his eye on a light that seems to sit up on the hill. it moves around a little bit too.
     thank you for letting me air this out in my mind and heart. there is also many witnesses, oh yea, about the time the gold ball was noticeing me, 2 hours after i called them, a fayetteville police car came creeping aby at 5 miles an hour with his light off. he was right beneath them for a while. his head was trying to sink all the way down in his seat and coast by. there was real possibilty of an attack so a cop with a fire arm would have been welcome, very welcome. i could feel his fear as he went by. he didnt notice or bother anyone standing outside. also this is a long duration sighting. i did develope mrsa a few weeks later.I lost 17 pounds and almost died. my mother did some research on the internet and she called me and said that the blue sparkly thing had been seen over the line in oklahoma. said that it was seen more often when we come our closest to mars ev ery five years. we are also within 60 miles of a rumored underground base and possible ufo crash in spiro oklahoma. thats also the site of some native american mounds, ancient things.My phone number is [phone number removed/cms/tg]. i wish to speak with someone, please.
content.summary: There was a blue sparkly thing above trees across the road from my daughters house. there was also a bright gold ball, a smaller blue sparkly thing, 5 differently colored transparent house shaped things and a black, flat, very fast craft with a huge f

content.detailedDescription: Simply stepped out onto my patio, looked up and there it was. it was a bright orangeish- yellow globe. i thought it may have been a chinese latern but, the wind was at my back and the object was moving towards me. it had spikes like those of a compass. straight line. excitement no fear.  though afterwards very, very agitated. very little sleep that night. i did get my cell phone and was able to snap to photo of it. the object simply just vanished in a heartbeat before my eyes. thanks for being here, it's difficult to speak to others about an event of this nature. i'm not very tech savvy and don't know how to post my photo. what a great start to my new year. the best to you all at mufon.
content.summary: Orb

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home at around 12:15am on january 1st. saw around 8 - 10 reddish/orange orbs flying in a path coming from the north to south over new port richey, florida. then the objects turned toward the west and flew out of sight due to cloud cover. at first, i thought they were airplanes or helicopters. but then i pulled the car over to the side of the road to take a better look. there was no airplane or jet sound. there was no helicopter sound. to the best of my knowledge, these objects were not anything i've ever seen before.
content.summary: Saw around 8 - 10 reddish/orange orbs flying in a path coming from the north to south over new port richey. then turned toward the west and flew out of sight due to clouds.

content.detailedDescription: Noticed a light at 4:15pm in the distance about 20-25 degrees above the horizon to my sw., above but way to the west of the mukilteo ferry landing, seemingly well out over the olympic peninsula. light was very bright, large (3x or 4x larger than jupiter on a clear night) pulsating and changing colors from white, to orange, bright red, and blue/green. seemed to be stationary for 10 minutes then slowly appeared to move and descend off to the nw, briefly sinking from view behind the mast of the uss nimitz, reappearing low on the north side of the ship's island then reversing direction to reappear on the south side of the island where it disappeared below the the olympic mountains about 2 minutes later. at first i wrote this off as venus or jupiter being magnified by the atmospheric conditions but the light was not there on the 31st. or tonight.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Observed large, bright, pulsating light changing colors hovering then moving off.

content.detailedDescription:
Saturday 14th dec 2014.
9.18pm video taken and attached.
was filming a lightning and thunder storm over adelaide from the backyard.  after a lightning display from the same area of the sky, i saw a vague shape go over me, transparent but my backyard light uplit it. happened within a few seconds, it was around 30 feet long and about 50 feet high above me and made no noise.  i uploaded the video to see what it was.   i have captured on video, transparent ufos in the past.   they seem to be very flexible and continual shape shift.  i do have a better example of what this video could be of or what i think it is photo attached.    i noticed in this video 2 prominent spheres (but there is a third sphere to the side if you look carefully) all alternate to the front as if it leap frogs its momentum, gliding through the atmosphere perhaps. most times these transparent types do not appear to the human eye and appear only on video in particular during rainy periods or thunderstorms.
content.summary: Transparent with alternating 3 spheres within it

content.detailedDescription: I will give you the best description of the event as i can. it started when my dad spotted what he thought was a reflection off the new power lines behind my uncle dons new house (fullerton,ca) it was a object that dad was looking at. he got dons binoculars and started watching it close to see what it was, he could not id it. side note: dad was in the af for 28yrs and he flew bombers as well fighters, he flew his own plan until he was 81. he knew it was something other than a plane. don work for the power company as electrical engineer. when dad ask for the binoculars mom and my aunt went out side to see what was going on and they watched it as well. what was over heard by our parents, got me and my cousins headed outside to see what was going on. and this is where it got spooky.... we all looked up and there they were just hovering making no noise, what happened was this; watching the big ship, and then 3 smaller ones showed up out of no where, they hovered for about min then into the big ship, then in ( what i will say, 90 sec ) it had these round ball like things come out faster than you can blink, in a vee shape (6 to 8) then it just vanished leaving a small smoke trail, then it disappeared, like poof!! i can finish with this; i know my dad reported it and was told not to reveal anything about it, he never said any more about it.I can tell you i was scared after that, and i never said anything about it tell now. i would like to know what happened to that report that dad turned in?? all this took place around 1950/1951. (i was born in 1942.)he made the report at a military base in san pedro,ca, it was an army base.
content.summary: The object hovered over my uncle dons new house. my dad us air force pilot spoted it first,then my mom and aunt,then me an my two cusains.
